com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Interface RecoverableDatabaseOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecoverableDatabaseOperationsImpl

    public interface RecoverableDatabaseOperations
    Contains operations for getting Azure SQL Databases that can be recovered.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RecoverableDatabaseGetResponse get(java.lang.String targetServerName, java.lang.String sourceServerName, java.lang.String sourceDatabaseName)
      Returns information about a recoverable Azure SQL Database.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<RecoverableDatabaseGetResponse> getAsync(java.lang.String targetServerName, java.lang.String sourceServerName, java.lang.String sourceDatabaseName)
      Returns information about a recoverable Azure SQL Database.
      RecoverableDatabaseListResponse list(java.lang.String targetServerName, java.lang.String sourceServerName)
      Returns a collection of databases that can be recovered from a specified server.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<RecoverableDatabaseListResponse> listAsync(java.lang.String targetServerName, java.lang.String sourceServerName)
      Returns a collection of databases that can be recovered from a specified server.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        RecoverableDatabaseGetResponse get(java.lang.String targetServerName,
                                 java.lang.String sourceServerName,
                                 java.lang.String sourceDatabaseName)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          ServiceException,
                                          javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                          org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Returns information about a recoverable Azure SQL Database.
        Parameters:
        targetServerName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which to recover the source database.
        sourceServerName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the database was hosted.
        sourceDatabaseName - Required. The name of the recoverable Azure SQL Database to be obtained.
        Returns:
        Contains the response to the Get Recoverable Database request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.

      • getAsync

                                                                   java.lang.String sourceServerName,
                                                                   java.lang.String sourceDatabaseName)
        Returns information about a recoverable Azure SQL Database.
        Parameters:
        targetServerName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which to recover the source database.
        sourceServerName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the database was hosted.
        sourceDatabaseName - Required. The name of the recoverable Azure SQL Database to be obtained.
        Returns:
        Contains the response to the Get Recoverable Database request.

        RecoverableDatabaseListResponse list(java.lang.String targetServerName,
                                   java.lang.String sourceServerName)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            ServiceException,
                                            javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Returns a collection of databases that can be recovered from a specified server.
        Parameters:
        targetServerName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which to recover the source database.
        sourceServerName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the databases were hosted.
        Returns:
        Contains the response to the List Recoverable Databases request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was a serious configuration error with the document parser.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the XML response.
